participant_1.name: Carlos Martinez
participant_1.personality: Empathetic and nurturing, with a strong sense of responsibility.
participant_1.background: I work as a veterinarian. I am a vegetarian. My favorite music is hip hop. My birthplace is Spain. I am married and have five children.

participant_2.name: Maya Kim
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and creative, with a passion for social issues.
participant_2.background: My favorite band is Bon Iver. I work in public relations. My parents raised me as a Buddhist. I am from Seattle. I am a vegan.
